trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et valgbar element i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: MenuItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: MenuItem er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, noe som betyr topp- og objektsamlingen kan være av en annen type (for eksempel streng, image eller panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: A MenuItem can have submenus.
trans-unit.target: Et MenuItem kan ha undermenyer.

trans-unit.source: The submenu of the MenuItem is made up of the objects within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> of a MenuItem.
trans-unit.target: Undermenyen til MenuItem består av objekter i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>av en MenuItem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: It is common for a MenuItem to contain other MenuItem objects to create nested submenus.
trans-unit.target: Det er felles for MenuItem kan inneholde andre MenuItem-objekter for å opprette nestede undermenyer.

trans-unit.source: A MenuItem can have one of several functions: - It can be selected to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: Et MenuItem kan ha flere funksjoner:-velge å aktivere en kommando.

trans-unit.source: - It can be a separator for other menu items.
trans-unit.target: -Det kan være et skilletegn for andre menyelementer.

trans-unit.source: - It can be a header for a submenu.
trans-unit.target: -Det kan være et hode for en undermeny.

trans-unit.source: - It can be checked or unchecked.
trans-unit.target: -Det kan være merket eller umerket.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a MenuItem is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som standard <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>for en MenuItem er satt til <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard vannrette posisjonen for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>er <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a MenuItem through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>for MenuItem via en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>stakk panelets standard brukes og elementet midtstilles.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: TheMenuItem handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event, so if you attach an event handler to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, your handler will never be called.
trans-unit.target: TheMenuItem håndtak i <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>hendelsen, så hvis du knytte en hendelsesbehandling til <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, vil aldri kalt din behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: To add your own handler, subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> event or subscribe to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til ditt eget behandlingsprogram, kan du abonnere på de <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>hendelsen eller abonnere på <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>ved å kalle <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>med `handledEventsToo` satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the MenuItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple MenuItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse MenuItem kontrollen til i gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere MenuItem kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Gi kontrollen unikt utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the MenuItem, see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for MenuItem, kan du se [menystiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in MenuItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i MenuItem kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kommandoen som er forbundet med menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å knytte en kommando for en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>forekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The following example associates the **Copy** command with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel knytter det **kopi** kommando med en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>og leverer automatisk inndata bevegelse teksten **Ctrl + C**.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The example does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> property, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is "Copy" at run time.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet ikke angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>-egenskapen, men <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>er "Kopi" på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify another header for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> if you want it to be different.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en annen overskrift for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>Hvis du vil skal være forskjellig.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du binde til ønsket kommando, kan du se [legge til en kommando i en MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[MenuItems_snip#MenuItemCommand](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/MenuItems_snip.Menus/Pane1.xaml#menuitemcommand)] A command is raised when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is clicked—just after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[MenuItems_snip #MenuItemCommand](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/MenuItems_snip.Menus/Pane1.xaml#menuitemcommand) ] en kommando oppstår når en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>klikkes – bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities: 1.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen oppstår for elementet i henhold til følgende egenskaper: 1.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, that element is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A>er angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, brukes dette elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property specifies the element where the command occurs.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CommandTarget angir elementet der kommandoen forekommer.

trans-unit.source: If CommandTarget is not set, the element that has keyboard focus will receive the command.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CommandTarget ikke er angitt, mottar elementet som har tastaturfokus kommandoen.

trans-unit.target: Det er ofte ikonene, merke av, aktiviteter og for å angi undermenyer.

trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen knytte ikke inndata bevegelse med menyalternativet; Det legges til en tekst til menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: The application must handle the user's input to carry out the action.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må behandle brukerinndata til å utføre handlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om menyen velger annet element beholdere, avhengig av elementet i den underliggende samlingen eller noen andre heuristisk.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig hvis du vil opprette en meny ved binding til en samling.

trans-unit.source: The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Elementbeholderen er UI-elementet som vises i en samling.

trans-unit.source: If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> property to true and create an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> for each type of object in your collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ønsker å binde til en samling for å opprette en meny som inneholder <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>objekter og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>objekter, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A>egenskapen true for å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>for hver objekttypen i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> must contain either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>må inneholde enten en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>
